synopsis.text: Can't seem to catch a break, Keiichi Morisato is eager for a fresh start at university. However, his unlucky star casts a shadow over his life, making everything from clubs to love a constant struggle. When he's left alone to tend to the dorm and a pile of chores, Keiichi's misfortune takes a surprising turn. He inadvertently dials the Goddess Help Line, leading to an encounter with the enchanting Belldandy, a first-class goddess. In a twist of fate, Keiichi wishes for Belldandy to remain by his side forever, setting the stage for a series of extraordinary events. As they navigate their newfound relationship, Keiichi and Belldandy must overcome obstacles that threaten to separate them. Will their bond endure, or will external forces return Belldandy to the heavens? Join Keiichi on his journey from unlucky student to a young man experiencing the divine in this heartwarming and captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
